author: Stan Schroeder
title: Google Duo raises video chat limit amid coronavirus pandemic
description: If you're still looking for that perfect group video chat app, maybe it's time to take another look at Google Duo. Android Central noticed that Google Duo increased the maximum number of participants in a video call to 12, up from 8. In a tweet, Google senior…
content:
If you're still looking for that perfect group video chat app, maybe it's time to take another look at Google Duo. 
Android Central noticed that Google Duo increased the maximum number of participants in a video call to 12, up from 8. 
In a tweet, Google se… [+1356 chars]
